empty_state_stats: No stats yet, ask your first question!
reason_fanny_gold_miya_short: Against Fanny in Gold, Miya offers safer farm and positioning.
plan_early_miya_vs_fanny: Early: focus on safe last hits, avoid river skirmishes.
plan_mid_miya_vs_fanny: Mid: group for objectives, keep vision on flanks.
plan_late_miya_vs_fanny: Late: stay behind frontline, kite with attack speed.
generic_reason: A balanced choice for most matchups.
generic_early: Early: play safe and watch enemy rotations.
generic_late: Late: stick to team and avoid picks.
